title: Should I stay in Aix-en-Provence or Marseille? - Quora

response.answer_text: It just depends on your aims. Marseille is a very inspirational city in a very pleasant place with great museums and many historical buildings. It is also one of the most cosmopolitan city in France. There are many good restaurants for any taste and budget in the city. Aix-en-Provence is famous for its cultural institutions and university.
What are you loooking for? Marseilles has a big-city buzz while Aix is a very pleasant provincial university town. Personally, I wold rather stay in Avignon and visit the others.
Both if you can. Marseille has the Vieux Port area worth a visit whereas Aix has the Cours Mirabeau and all the surrounding streets.
